Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the various deployment editors against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: Helps in adding files to the deployment project.
Helps in displaying the custom dialog boxes at different installation phases.
Sets actions to be performed at the end of an installation.
Provides the <font face="courier new">BodyText</font> property to set the text for the dialog boxes.
Provides the <font face="courier new">InstallerClass</font> property to check whether the action is the <font face="courier new">InstallerClass</font> class.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(File System Editor), (B)-(User Interface Editor), (C)-(Custom Actions Editor), (D)-(User Interface Editor), and (E)-(Custom Actions Editor).
